pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Jose Valverde; Blake Davis is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .881 OPS against them this season and .650 against everything else.
Jose Valverde got Blake Davis to chase a four-seam fastball; Davis is hitting .000 against them in that location this season compared to .232 overall.
